page.title: 05Employment in Invermoriston
page.content: There is a high proportion of elderly retired people in addition to a large number of unemployed or those who have only part-time employment.Much of the woek is seasonal catering for holiday- makers. The main employer is Glenmoriston Estates with its many chalets,hotel, craft and gift shops in addition to its office and estate staff.The Forestry Commission has recently cut back on the number of jobs it can offer but still employs about 15% of Invermoriston's population.The North of Scotland Hydro-Electric Board has also fewer workers.The nearby Fishfarm employs a few young people .The village shop provides part-time work for a few women.A large proportion travel a long distance to work coming home at weekends ,or have to leave home altogether to obtain employment.
